title: Quick Transmigration: Rescue Plan for the Misguided Villain Boss - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Romance   Shoujo   Tragedy   Xianxia
tags: Abusive Characters   Acting   Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Calm Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Cultivation   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Episodic   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Shameless Protagonist   Sickly Characters   System Administrator   Transmigration   Tsundere   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping
author: 砚落白
description:
Ye Chuijin proceeded on the Quick Transmigration path to save the universe from destruction.

Villain bosses are different. Only one thing is constant.

Ye Chuijin touched her face and sighed. 'Why do you love me so much?'

'Is it only because I look fine and beautiful?' she mumbled to herself, her eyes clouded.

The system was numb: 'Please correct the host's three views. Don't get carried away with your own beauty.'>
